description: Jonathan Scott Smith is an experienced, successful problem solver with over 35 years experience. We limit the cases we handle so that we can give you the personal attention you need and deserve. Mr. Smith, a Maryland Super Lawyer, has the prestigious "AV Preeminent" rating, the highest peer review rating for professional skills and ethics. We excel at solving problems for our clients, often resolving legal issues without having to go to court. When court is necessary, Mr. Smith will use his extensive courtroom experience to fight hard for you, and provide thorough and quality representation. Please visit our websites (www.jonathanscottsmithlaw.com and howard-county-criminal-law.com) for numerous testimonials from many satisfied clients.
